arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Monaco 5-1 Crvena Zvezda: Takumi Minamino nets brace as Monégasques continue unbeaten run in Champions League
arts.sum: UEFA Champions League, Round 3, 22/10/24 AS Monaco continued their unbeaten start to the season, hammering Serbian side Crvena Zvezda and provisionally going top in the UEFA Champions League table. …

arts.ttl: Pulisic's goal from a corner helps Milan to Champions League win. Monaco stays unbeaten
arts.sum: Christian Pulisic scored direct from a corner and there was VAR heartbreak for 16-year-old Francesco Camarda as AC Milan beat Brugge 3-1 to end its wait for a Champions League win, while Monaco kept its unbeaten start going. United States forward Pulisic seemed stunned by his feat — known as an “Olimpico” — as Milan finally earned its first three points, having lost its opening two games in the new-look format.

arts.ttl: Highly-rated AS Monaco prospects make first Champions League squad

arts.ttl: Monaco vs Red Star Belgrade: Preview, predictions and lineups
arts.sum: Monaco are aiming to continue their impressive start to the 2024/25 season when they receive a visit from Red Star Belgrade in the Champions League this Tuesday. Adi Hutter's side are still unbeaten in all competitions, winning seven and drawing three of their opening ten matches across Ligue 1 and the Champions League.
Aidan Perkins has cast his eye on all 18 Champions League games during Matchday Three this week and has a score prediction for each game.
